scripts.dev: bun run build:shared && bun run db:generate && bun run dev:all
scripts.dev:all: bun run --filter '@autolink/shared' dev & bun run --filter '@autolink/server' dev & bun run --filter '@autolink/web' dev & bun run --filter '@autolink/app' dev & wait
scripts.dev:server: bun run build:shared && bun run db:generate && bun run --filter '@autolink/server' dev
scripts.dev:web: bun run build:shared && bun run --filter '@autolink/web' dev
scripts.dev:app: bun run build:shared && bun run --filter '@autolink/app' dev
scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run db:generate && bun run build:consumers
scripts.lint: bun run build:shared && bun run --filter '*' lint
scripts.test: bun run build:shared && bun run --filter '*' test
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/server && bunx prisma migrate dev && cd ../.. && bun run db:generate
scripts.db:push: cd packages/server && bunx prisma db push && cd ../.. && bun run db:generate
